text:
(1) Pierrepont Street, south side, west from No. 20 at left foreground. The building with the flag displayed is No. 10, and known as the Chittenden House. At the left background, is a part of the Pierrepont Mansion facing and known as No. 1 Pierrepont Place.

May 1925.
Eugene L. Armbruster Collection.

(2) A continuation of No. 1, showing at left background, the complete view of the Pierrepont Mansion, facing Pierrepont Place. At left is a partial view of No. 6 Pierrepont Street.

April 1925.
Eugene L. Armbruster Collection.

(1) Pierrepont Street, south side, west from No. 20 at left foreground. The building with the flag displayed is No. 10, and known as the Chittenden House. At the left background, is a part of the Pierrepont Mansion facing and known as No. 1 Pierrepont Place.

May 1925.
Eugene L. Armbruster Collection.

(2) A continuation of No. 1, showing at left background, the complete view of the Pierrepont Mansion, facing Pierrepont Place. At left is a partial view of No. 6 Pierrepont Street.

April 1925.
Eugene L. Armbruster Collection.
